price: 20. Owner of power, (and high rank) with (Allâh), the Lord of the Throne,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
